com.here.android.mpa.prefetcher

Class MapDataPrefetcher.Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.prefetcher.MapDataPrefetcher.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapDataPrefetcher.Listener
    Enclosing class:
    MapDataPrefetcher

    public abstract static class MapDataPrefetcher.Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapDataPrefetcher.Listener
    Default implementation for the MapDataPrefetcher.Listener interface. Clients may use this abstract class and overload specific methods to have a smaller code footprint.
    See Also:
    MapDataPrefetcher.Listener

      • onDataSizeEstimated

        public void onDataSizeEstimated(int requestId,
                                boolean success,
                                long dataSizeKB)
        Description copied from interface: MapDataPrefetcher.Listener
        Called when data size estimation for a fetch is completed.
        Specified by:
        onDataSizeEstimated in interface MapDataPrefetcher.Listener
        Parameters:
        requestId - Id of the estimation request.
        success - True if the attempt to get an estimation was successful.
        dataSizeKB - The estimated size of the fetch request in KB. The size will be 0 on if the attempt at estimation was not successful.
        Override:
